steps.name: I can login successfully into the application
I select the product from Product Store page
I click Add to cart button
I should received Product added popup message
I click Cart button from the navbar menu
I should see "Thank you for your purchase!" popup message
I should be redirected to Product Page

name: Testing Happy Path testing for Demoblaze app
